text: Roman Vishniac (; ; August 19, 1897 â€“ January 22, 1990) was a Russian-American photographer and a biologist. He is well known for taking pictures of Jewish culture in Central and Eastern Europe before the Holocaust. Many of these pictures are in his book, A Vanished World, published in 1983. ==Other websites== Category:American photographers Category:Russian photographers Category:1897 births Category:1990 deaths
title: Roman Vishniac
